headline: VZ vs ASTS: Which Connectivity Stock Should You Invest In Now?

headline: Pine Reveals Its 2025 ‘Consumer Friction’ Index
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., January 14, 2026--Pine, the trusted AI agent for consumers’ digital chores that delivers results, today revealed its Consumer Friction Index – the top companies people use Pine for most to lower their bills, seek compensation, cancel subscriptions, correct delivery issues and address other problems that they find too complicated, frustrating or time consuming to fix alone.
